entry.summary: RTâ€‚Kui He Don't forget today's koinos Talk. I host the show with fellow @developer_dao member @lukemwillis. Luke is a seasoned developer and a recent crypto convert while I've been using fee less blockchains and aping since 2017. You'll get both sides of the picture on why koinos. The Koinos Forum:â€‚Tomorrow, we're going to explain why we're all in on Koinos, in detail. We'll list why the bet is favorable and where there are going to be challenges along the ride. â€‚https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1OwxWzEEypAJQ
